title: GLAM LADY REALTOR HIRES HIT-MAN TO OFF MOTHER-IN-LAW?
itunes:title: GLAM LADY REALTOR HIRES HIT-MAN TO OFF MOTHER-IN-LAW?
description:
Well-known Missouri real estate agent, Leigh Ann Bauman, has been charged in a murder-for-hire plot.. Bauman allegedly agreed to pay $1,500 to have her former mother-in-law killed. Court documents say Bauman thought her ex-husband and former mother-in-law were going to challenge her in court for full custody of the couple’s children.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Dale Carson - Criminal Defense Attorney (Jacksonville), Former FBI Agent, Former Police Officer, Author: "Arrest-Proof Yourself"
  • Dr. Jorey Krawczyn - Police Psychologist, Adjunct Faculty with Saint Leo University; Research Consultant with Blue Wall Institute, Author: Operation S.O.S. - Practical Recommendations to Help “Stop Officer Suicide” (July 2021) bw-institute.com
  • Steven Lampley - Author, Speaker, Retired Police Officer, Undercover SVU Detective, & Author: "12 and Murdered," www.stevendavidlampley.com, Facebook.com/StevenDavidLampleyPage
  • Levi Page - Crime Online Investigative Reporter, Host, "Crime and Scandal" True Crime Podcast, YouTube.com/LeviPageTV 



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
